title: Client crashed in Ranked champ select.
body: So the absolute instant I got into champ select.  The client stopped working and crashed.  I log back in and saw that I instantly got a loss.  This was my second loss for my promo series from Silver 1 to Gold 5.  The likelihood of winning the next 3 games will be difficult.  Just wondering if there is anything you can do for me, or am I just screwed out of that game and play on?

replies.body:
We cannot modify your LP or match history, therefore we cannot remove losses under any circumstances. :'(

These types of crashes are caused by your client having a poor connection to our servers. I encourage you to work through the steps outlined in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure that everything is up to par.

Let me know if you have any further issues with this.
